Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.service

Klasse ViewLoaderService

java.lang.Object
org.com.service.ViewLoaderService
public class ViewLoaderService extends Object
Service for loading and managing JavaFX views and scenes. Handles view transitions and scene setup for different application stages.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Umut

  • Methodendetails

    • loadView

      public void loadView(String viewPath, javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane mainContentPane)
      Loads a view into a BorderPane and updates the current stage's scene.
      Parameter:
      viewPath - Path to the FXML view resource
      mainContentPane - BorderPane to be replaced

    • loadDashboardView

      public void loadDashboardView(List<Cinematic> cinematics, javafx.scene.control.TextField usernameField)
      Loads the dashboard view with cinematics and updates the current stage.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - List of cinematics to be displayed
      usernameField - TextField used to access the current stage

    • loadView

      public void loadView(String viewPath, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Loads a view into a specified stage.
      Parameter:
      viewPath - Path to the FXML view resource
      stage - Stage to load the view into
